items.title: ‘Falling apart in real time.’ Former star Fidelity manager warns on OpenAI, tells investors to shelter in these assets.
items.description: Veteran money manager George Noble sees high risk in AI adjacent plays as OpenAI starts to fall apart. He has advice on where to shelter.

items.title: Bessent: Deutsche Bank CEO doesn’t stand by analyst report saying Europeans could dump Treasury securities
items.description: Deutsche Bank CEO Christian Sewing was faced with a choice of defending one of his analysts or a key client — the U.S. Treasury Department.

items.title: This bitcoin evangelist says inflation is far exceeding official statistics — by tracking ribeye prices
items.description: Forget the consumer price index — this bitcoin evangelist is tracking ribeye steak prices for what he thinks is a better measure of inflation.

items.title: Easing the rift? King Charles invites Harry and Meghan to use his country estate.
items.description: The historic home offers a level of privacy which the couple would not likely have in London or Windsor.

items.title: Former ‘Real Housewives’ star Yolanda Hadid pulls historic $11 million farmhouse off the market
items.description: Former “Real Housewives of Beverly Hills” star Yolanda Hadid has taken her $10.88 million Pennsylvania farm off the market, three months after she lis...
